person.note: Wen(2) Yanbo [1953] Posthumously purged as a Yuanyou coalition member. Jifu's [7391] and Baoyong's [1952] father, Yongshi's [1954] grandfather, maternal grandfather of Fan(2) Chengda's [7211] mother, Chen(1) Guan's [67] son-in-law, affinal relation of Fan(2) Yu(3) [7028] and Han(1) Zongdao [663], and his wife's lineage member was Chen(1) Anmin [16]. He was the father-in-law of Ren(1) Zhongzheng's [875], Ren(1) Zhongxing's [876] and Ren(1) Zhongshi's [877] son and/or nephew, Ren(1) Yuanqing [3431] and also of Cai(1) Xiang(1)'s [1651] son, Min [3864]. At one time or another, Yanbo recommended Chu(3) Jianzhong [164], Fan(2) Yu(5) [591], Hu(1) Zongyan [832], Li(2) Zhichun [1000], Tang(2) Yiwen [1596], Cao(1) Yingshu [1671] and Du(3) Chun [1724]. He also recommended Wang(2) Qinchen [1767] for the academy exams. XCB, 127.14b, 133.19b, 224.1a; 413.11a-14a; SS, 313.10b-11a; Du Dagui, 'xia,' 13.1a; YLDD, 12400.2a-2b, 17b. CBD, 1, 43-47.

desc.label: 續資治通鑑長編166.3982:「戡女嫁宰相文彥博之子」

desc.desc: Listed in Yuanyou coalition register (元祐黨)Supportive political association
入元祐黨籍者政治奧援

desc.label: 嘉祐六年進士 知河南縣 以文彥博薦擢知泉州 改建州 以治最聞
著書傳經 以詭辨惑眾 文彥博薦諸朝 賜五品服 劉敞與歐陽修乞追還詔書
自部使者而下 皆十損七八 文彥博 包拯皆薦其廉能 後以光祿卿致仕卒
訪其舅范純仁 過洛 見文彥博、司馬光 咸見器重 後知南雄
太原人 高蹈不仕 時宰執寇準、文彥博、王曙、陳堯佐、范仲俺咸推重之
歐冶子鑄劍地也 富弼為築室以居 范仲淹、文彥博皆欲薦之 辭不就
學法於四方 歷問各僧 文彥博表其行 賜紫方袍 元豐六年九月卒
出文彥博門下，彥博使人送往程顥處。
